novels.title: The Croaking
novels.description: The Roost - the worldâ€™s most prestigious military academy - has never accepted a Crow into its ranks.

novels.title: EMPYREA
novels.description: For centuries, twelve Guardians and the Knights who serve them have protected Mankind from the fearsome Keres, ancient creatures with a thirst for souls. However, a series of sudden and brutal attacks threatens the fragile peace between Realms.
